name: Some Great Cave Offensive
description:
Hi

A game where you dig and collect stars. Hey! Those meteor fragments are scattered everywhere in the old mine, let’s dig them out!

Game created by IkigaiSeitetsu(programming, major part of level design, sound effects), Snivy_Lei(art, part of level design)

Note and hints - 40+ screens of level (about 25 minutes gameplay) - There are 32 stars in total - This game has an ending - I post a thumbnail of the full map in a seperate blog post, check it out in case you are lost Post-LD changelog
  • bugfix1.1 (4.28.2021): (Hopefully) fixed the bug which allowed cloning the player character by dying when the physical update rate was slow at the moment, game possibly calling the death routine twice or more during a single graphical update.
